name: flickr.photos.getContactsPublicPhotos
description: Fetch a list of recent public photos from a users' contacts.
authentication: This method does not require authentication.

arguments.name: api_key
arguments.description: Your API application key.See herefor more details.

arguments.name: user_id
arguments.description: The NSID of the user to fetch photos for.

arguments.name: count
arguments.description: Number of photos to return. Defaults to 10, maximum 50. This is only used ifsingle_photois not passed.

arguments.name: just_friends
arguments.description: set as 1 to only show photos from friends and family (excluding regular contacts).

arguments.name: single_photo
arguments.description: Only fetch one photo (the latest) per contact, instead of all photos in chronological order.

arguments.name: include_self
arguments.description: Set to 1 to include photos from the user specified by user_id.

arguments.name: extras
arguments.description: A comma-delimited list of extra information to fetch for each returned record. Currently supported fields are: license, date_upload, date_taken, owner_name, icon_server, original_format, last_update.

response:
<photos>
  <photo id="2801" owner="12037949629@N01" secret="123456" server="1" username="Eric is the best" title="grease" />
  <photo id="2499" owner="33853651809@N01" secret="123456" server="1" username="cal18" title="36679_o" />
  <photo id="2437" owner="12037951898@N01" secret="123456" server="1" username="georgie parker" title="phoenix9_stewart" />
</photos>

errors.title: User not foundThe user NSID passed was not a valid user NSID.
Invalid API KeyThe API key passed was not valid or has expired.
Service currently unavailableThe requested service is temporarily unavailable.
Write operation failedThe requested operation failed due to a temporary issue.
Format "xxx" not foundThe requested response format was not found.
Method "xxx" not foundThe requested method was not found.
Invalid SOAP envelopeThe SOAP envelope send in the request could not be parsed.
Invalid XML-RPC Method CallThe XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.
Bad URL foundOne or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.
